mutants.code:
def find_min_packets(N, M, packets):
    packets.sort()
    i = N + 1
    sumz = 0
    count = 0
    while i >= 0:
        sumz += packets[i]
        count += 1
        if sumz >= M:
            return count
        i -= 1
    return -1
